Frankly, Negare maintains the relationship only because of the NTR issue. Literally, she enjoys being with Ochiai more! The woman with whom he drinks coffee, is the one who rejected Ochiai many chapters ago, I am sure that she would meet Kaname's mother, turn her into a bitch, then she only did her mother a favor, making Kaname doubt the sexual pleasure of, I wonder, what will Ochiai think when he sees her as a bitch? Will the loli end up getting involved in all this? The mother will fuck Tooru? It's what I want the most, otherwise it will be the classic NTR where Tooru ends up traumatized.
